committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: A bill to amend the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982 with respect to the Office of the Nuclear Waste Negotiator.

summary.text: Amends the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982 to establish the Office of the Nuclear Waste Negotiator as an independent establishment in the executive branch. (Currently such office is part of the Executive Office of the President.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982 with respect to the Office of the Nuclear Waste Negotiator.
